message: 'com.actionbarsherlock.view.Menu' should be separated from previous imports.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mNativeMenu' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mNativeMap' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
